articles.author: Seamus Webster
articles.title: One out of every 15 Americans is a millionaire, UBS says
articles.description: The U.S. has 22 million people worth at least $1 million, according to UBS, about the same as Western Europe and China combined.
articles.content: Nearly 22 million people in the U.S.roughly one in 15 Americanshad wealth upwards of $1 million last year, according to UBS 2024 global wealth report. While thats down from 22.7 million in 2022, the … [+2245 chars]

articles.title: Long periods of political violence are ‘very bad’ for markets, analyst warns
